title: Best of The Herd for Mar 24, 2020
itunes:title: Best of The Herd for Mar 24, 2020
description:
Cowboys Center Travis Frederick retiring is bad news for Dak

If you think Bill Belichick doesn't have a plan you are crazy

Players retiring early is good for the NFL and the players

A Post Free Agency edition of the Herd Hierarchy

Guest: Joel Klatt, FOX CFB Analyst
